name: Broken Game
description:
Broken Game

This is a puzzle game, the idea is that every thing in this game is messed up so you need to figure out how to collect the coins to move to the next level.

The Game has 15 Level, More levels will be added soon.

Credits:
Main Menu Music : Kim Lightyear - Walking On Clouds.
TileSet : https://craftpix.net
Background Layers : created by Eder Muniz.
The other sprites (Player, Coin etc.) : xX7sMoDXx.
Game Created by xX7sMoDXx.
